attributes.review: I just look at the app and think of this big orange disgusting man which I am not comfortable with! The app glitches a lot, has many bugs, and logs me out each time so y’all should really consider deleting this before all the reviews do 💁🏻‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️.
attributes.title: Disgusting and horrible app🧚🏼‍♀️.                 .........

attributes.review: it is so glitchy and have my phone a virus. i cant even take a picture on my camera without my phone restarting. the app acts SO SLOW and takes up so much of my storage and battery. it really glitches a lot i’m so angry i spent my time downloading this.
attributes.title: glitchy

attributes.review: This app is super HORRIBLE! As HORRIBLE as the president himself! The app kept on crashing my phone when I’d open it and my whole phone would just black out!(keep in mind I have a new iPhone 11) Definitely not a good app, don’t waste your time!!!! I’d rather download tik tok!
attributes.title: Try it for yourself and you’ll get scammed

attributes.review:
This app was falsely advertised as it showed some things that weren’t on the actual app. As I downloaded the app you could believe the surprise to my eyes when I saw a non-blind and a non-deaf person right to my face. Very disappointing and disgusting at the way I was called out and disrespected.

Sincerely, Hellen Keller👩🏼‍🦯
attributes.title: Misleading😾

attributes.review: This app should get one star. Trump is a horrible president. In MY OPINION. He is a rude man and a disgrace to all of us. He wants to ban a app called TIK TOK but racism and shooting should be ban. Our teen and kids lives are ruined. We enjoy tik tok and you took it away from us Trump. I hope our next president HAS A HEART and will be bring tik tok back.
attributes.title: WHY WE SHOULD GIVE IT A ONE STAR

attributes.review: Oh this spamming piece of crap....what the hell?!  It never makes sense, it’s also always sending me stupid messages. It never works, I’m not sure the people writing it even know how to read. Please take this down so no one else has to suffer through it.
attributes.title: I’d give it 0 stars if I could
